item.title: About Hugo
item.description:
Tutorial of Hugo !

This is test article to confirm how to use Hugo.

Can I create simple blog with this framework??

What is Hugo?

Hugo is a static site generator (SSG) written in Go (Golang).
It is known for its speed and flexibility, making it a popular choice for building websites and blogs. You can find more details from official site.

Getting Started

To get started with Hugo, you can follow these steps:
